Forest Mohammed Aqid Khatkhatay (mk4427) and Sanket Gokhale(sg3904) 2021-04-11 Chapter 1 Introduction

Chapter 2 Data sources In this project we use the following two data sets. Global Deforestation 1990-2021: Source: Food and Agriculture Organization (FAO) Link: http://www.fao.org/faostat/en/#data/GF GDP Growth Rate: Source: The World Bank Link: https://data.worldbank.org/indicator/NY.GDP.MKTP.KD.ZG Both these are open source datasets which can be taken in csv format. Since we have to compare the effects of the two datasets we have decided the time line 1990-2019 since these are the years common to both datasets and easy to process.
Chapter 3 Data transformation 3.1 Extraction 3.2 Transformation 3.3 Loading
